WordPress Pricing Table Website Design

Selling WordPress Website With A Pricing Table

This is a pricing table design that I made in Figma. My goal with this project was to advertise WordPress services in a way where it looks more like an off the shelf product than a concept or idea. The reason I did this is because I've noticed that their is a lot of people out their who are very interested in a starting a website but once they start looking into it they're quickly put off by the amount of options and tech vocabulary . I wanted to help these people by creating a page that includes website services in the form of this pricing table to give them a basic idea of what exactly it tis they're getting.

What I've noticed is that their's a ton of people out there who want to start a website but the moment they go look into one they're bombarded with a ton of offers filled with jargon keywords that just don't make a whole lot of sense to them. This usually causes them to just keep day dreaming about the idea and eventually they push it to the back of their mind.

The Different Tiers for This Pricing Table

In this design I included three tiers. Each tier has it's own benefits that I'll list and further elaborate. All of the tiers include free web hosting and domain.

Left - Basic Package

The basic package is for the average business owner who's just starting off and doesn't really want a whole lot. The tier includes custom design services for 1 - 5 pages. This package is perfect for a brochure style of website. This tier is the perfect foundation for your online presence.

Middle - Pro Package
